titles.title: Internet Freedom and Operations (INFO) Act of 2022
Internet Freedom and Operations (INFO) Act of 2022
A bill to authorize United States Government efforts to promote and protect internet freedom in countries where the freedom of information is under threat.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Internet Freedom and Operations (INFO) Act of 2022
This bill authorizes certain Department of State, U.S. Agency for International Development, and U.S. Agency for Global Media activities to promote internet freedom and support technologies for circumventing foreign government restrictions on internet access.
